summary: Comprehensive testing of System States & Events pages (404 error page, 500 error page, and Haptic Alert notifications). All features are fully functional with proper styling, data-testid attributes, and UI elements as specified.
critical_code_review_comments: 404 page correctly displays [SIGNAL LOST] heading with ERROR_CODE: 404_NOT_FOUND
500 page correctly displays [SYSTEM HALT] heading with red theme and ERROR_CODE: 500_INTERNAL_FAILURE
All technical metrics displayed correctly on both error pages
Haptic alerts appear in top-right corner with correct styling per alert type
Progress bar animation works correctly for auto-dismiss functionality
EmptyState component is defined but not currently used in any page - available for future use
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: System States & Events pages fully tested.
